items.text:
A notification can offer up to three action buttons that allow the user to
respond quickly, such as snooze a reminder or even reply to a text message.

To add an action button, pass a PendingIntent to the
addAction()
method.
Notifications remain visible until one of the following happens:

You call cancel() for a
    specific notification ID.
This method also deletes ongoing notifications.

You call cancelAll(),
    which removes all of the notifications you previously issued.
